remarks: Generalization of ~ axc16 .  Use the latter when sufficient. (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 18-Feb-2018.)  Remove dependency on ~ ax-13 , along an idea of BJ. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 30-Nov-2019.)
statement:
axc16g $p |- ( A. x x = y -> ( ph -> A. z ph ) ) $.
$d x y $.
